document_data.mainbody:
The necromancers robe was a unique enchanted robe that protected the wearer from death magic.
Despite its unassuming appearance, the necromancers robe gave the wearer a chance to negate death magic spells tossed at them and offered protection from magic.
The necromancers robe creator was a member of the Host Tower of the Arcane in Luskan who used the robe to protect himself during procurement of certain exotic items for the arcane research. However, necromancers robe did little to save the wizards life when he made an enemy of a ranking member of the Plague Rats. Several years later, the robe was purchased from the Rats by Presio, an evil necromancer-priestess. In the , Presio served marilith named Yxunomei who laired in the Dragons Eye along with her forces. With Presios death at the hands of the Heroes of Icewind Dale, the robe changed owners once again.
